body.p:
Covington Ky Sept 1, 1863
To His Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky:

The accompanying Petition prepared to forward to forward to Governor Robinson has been delayed and it is now enclosed to your Excellency as his successor. I heard the entire proof in the case and the Petition sets then ^facts^ forth very fairly. The Petitioner was indicted with several others which may be the reason his fine was so severe. I am acquainted with the Petitioner and recommend him to Executive clemency. With assurances of high Esteem.

Your Obt Servant
John P. Harrison
P.S. Please address reply to Box 303. Covington, Ky.
